BINDPARAMETER

Business rule type. Use this rule type to link properties of a column to values of different parameters. For example, set up the visibility of a column or enable a column depending on the value of another column.

FILTRATION

Business rule type. Use the FILTRATION rule to set up filtering of values in view model columns. For example, filter a LOOKUP column depending on the current status of a page.
